pages.title: Discovering Spells
pages.text: Spells are a form to cast magic similar to glyphs. Unlike the former, spells aren't consumed upon used, but instead have a cooldown.$(br)$(br)$(l)Discovering Spells$()$(br)To start discovering spells, you must craft a $(l)Exponentia Glyph $()and use it on a regular $(l)Crafting Table$().
